question: Can you explain the benefits of yoga for mental health and generate an image of a serene yoga scene?

steps.content: Can you explain the benefits of yoga for mental health and generate an image of a serene yoga scene?

Can you also tell me how often one should practice yoga to see these benefits?
Plan: 1) Search for recommended frequency of yoga practice for mental health benefits. 2) Return the answer.
Searching for recommended frequency of yoga practice for mental health benefits.
Practicing yoga 3-5 times a week is recommended to see mental health benefits.
